languages.text: "Врачевал и познавал". {n}Маска надменно вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Сапоги идущих дорогой мудрости оставляют кровавые следы. Не Леттард придумал это правило".

"He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."
languages.original_text: "Врачевал и познавал". {n}Маска надменно вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Сапоги идущих дорогой мудрости оставляют кровавые следы. Не Леттард придумал это правило".

traits.locale_text: "He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."
"I healed and I gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. I did not make that rule."
"I healed and I gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "'The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints.' That saying existed long before I did."
"I healed and I gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "'The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints.' That saying existed long before I did."

"He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

"He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

"He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

languages.text: « Il a soigné les malades et acquis ce faisant bien des connaissances. » {n}La tête masquée se relève d'un air hautain.{/n} « Les bottes de ceux qui empruntent la voie de la sagesse laissent des empreintes ensanglantées. Cette règle existait déjà bien avant l'arrivée de l'honorable Lettard. »
languages.original_text: "He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

traits.locale_text: « Il a soigné les malades et acquis ce faisant bien des connaissances. » {n}La tête masquée se relève d'un air hautain.{/n} « Les bottes de ceux qui empruntent la voie de la sagesse laissent des empreintes ensanglantées. Cette règle existait déjà bien avant l'arrivée de l'honorable Lettard. »

languages.text: «Curó a la gente y aprendió». {n}La figura enmascarada levanta bruscamente la cabeza.{/n} «Las botas que recorren el camino de la sabiduría dejan pisadas ensangrentadas. La regla es mucho más vieja que el venerable Lettard».
languages.original_text: "He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

traits.locale_text: «Curó a la gente y aprendió». {n}La figura enmascarada levanta bruscamente la cabeza.{/n} «Las botas que recorren el camino de la sabiduría dejan pisadas ensangrentadas. La regla es mucho más vieja que el venerable Lettard».

languages.text: 「彼は治療することで知識を得ました」{n}仮面をした顔が得意げに顔を上げる。{/n}「知恵の道を歩む者のブーツは、血の足跡を残します。名誉あるレタードがそうするずっと前から存在する決まりなのです」
languages.original_text: "He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は治療することで知識を得ました」{n}仮面をした顔が得意げに顔を上げる。{/n}「知恵の道を歩む者のブーツは、血の足跡を残します。名誉あるレタードがそうするずっと前から存在する決まりなのです」

languages.text: “他治愈了患者，还获得了知识。”{n}蒙面人傲慢地抬起了头。{/n}“但凡走在智慧之路上，就必定会留下沾血的足迹，这并非尊敬的莱塔德开创的先河。”
languages.original_text: "He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

traits.locale_text: “他治愈了患者，还获得了知识。”{n}蒙面人傲慢地抬起了头。{/n}“但凡走在智慧之路上，就必定会留下沾血的足迹，这并非尊敬的莱塔德开创的先河。”

languages.text: Er hat die Kranken behandelt und Wissen gesammelt. {n}Der maskierte Mann hebt hochmütig den Kopf.{/n} "Die Stiefel jener, die den Pfad der Weisheit beschreiten, hinterlassen blutige Fußspuren. Diese Regel ist weit älter, als es der geschätzte Lettard war."
languages.original_text: "He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."

traits.locale_text: Er hat die Kranken behandelt und Wissen gesammelt. {n}Der maskierte Mann hebt hochmütig den Kopf.{/n} "Die Stiefel jener, die den Pfad der Weisheit beschreiten, hinterlassen blutige Fußspuren. Diese Regel ist weit älter, als es der geschätzte Lettard war."

languages.text: "Hastaları tedavi edip yeni bilgiler edindi." {n}Maskeli kafa, mağrurca dikleşiyor.{/n} "Bilgeliğin yolundan yürüyenlerin çizmeleri, geride kanlı ayak izleri bırakır. Bu kural, muhterem Lettard'ın hayatından çok daha eskiye dayanır."
languages.original_text: "He treated the sick and he gained knowledge." {n}The masked head jerks up haughtily.{/n} "The boots of those who walk the path of wisdom leave bloodied footprints. It is a rule that existed long before the esteemed Lettard did."
